channel.title: [winterLove] Adding NPC loading
channel.description: I am using THEE basic winterLove, I was wondering how to add NPC loading/NPC's....

item.title: [winterLove] Adding NPC loading
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Nooooo… It doesn’t even have NPC’s at all. I know about autospawn lol.

it’s winterlove. It isn’t some faggotry delta shit. It’s actually a bit more complicated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 09:08:42 am[/size][hr]Ok… I Ripper NPCHandler, NPC, NPC list from Emulous. I got it down to 46 errors from 57, and I have a headache.

item.title: [winterLove] Adding NPC loading
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“Fission, post:1, topic:296951”]I am using THEE basic winterLove, I was wondering how to add NPC loading/NPC’s…[/quote]that would be in autospawn.cfg not gonna spoon feed you.

Read full topic
